items.title: Under-fire Zimbabwe president names new army chief
items.description: It comes ahead of planned protests by a group of war veterans who want Emmerson Mnangagwa to resign.

items.title: Putin floats idea of UN-led government in Ukraine
items.description: The move is seen as an attempt to challenge the legitimacy of the current authorities in Kyiv.

items.title: Bridge collapses into river in Mandalay, Myanmar
items.description: Video shows damage to the Ava Bridge, near Mandalay, after a 7.7-magnitude earthquake rocked central Myanmar.

items.title: Residents describe horror in aftermath of earthquake in Myanmar
items.description: A resident of Myanmar's largest city Yangon tells the BBC tremors lasted around four minutes.

items.title: State of emergency declared in Myanmar after huge earthquake
items.description: The quake hit central Myanmar with strong tremors felt as far as south-west China and Thailand.
